          EPOS, EPOS Recommends

          9 Best Luggage Stores in Singapore For All Your Travel Essentials

          Posted on May 11, 2022November 28, 2022 by Adrija Chakravarti

          Throw your hands in the air if you also love to travel! Wandering the world and exploring new destinations is always so exciting, but before you go, there are some essential things to consider. One of them being your luggage, of course! Quality, durability and lightweight—the three things you should always look for in luggage. After all, you don’t want to lug around a heavy suitcase or worse, have your belongings damaged when travelling! So, where can you find these travel essentials? Begin right here at these 9 travel stores to buy the best luggage in Singapore!

          Contents hide
          1. Samsonite
          2. American Tourister
          3. The Planet Traveller
          4. The Travel Store
          5. Tumi
          6. Rimowa
          7. Luggage Outlet
          8. Ace
          9. July
          Conclusion
          Related Posts

          1. Samsonite

          Facebook: Visit Here

          Instagram: Visit Here

          Website: https://www.samsonite.com.sg/

          Address: Locations

          Operating Hours: Locations

          If you’re an avid traveller, you must have heard of Samsonite. Having revolutionised travel with their innovative luggage ever improving since 1910, Samsonite has been a traveller’s best friend for over 110 years!

          Samsonite prides itself on four things: strength, security, lightweight and eco-friendliness. Their hard shell casing made of Curv® material can withstand the strongest forces, it’s extremely lightweight so you can pack more things, and their 3-point locking system is secure! Samsonite will protect your belongings as you travel the world. So if you’re looking for truly long-lasting travel gear, Samsonite is indeed one of the best places to buy your luggage in Singapore.

          2. American Tourister

          Facebook: Visit Here

          Instagram: Visit Here

          Website: https://www.americantourister.com.sg/

          Address: Locations

          Operating Hours: Locations

          Looking for fun, colourful and on trend? American Tourister may be your choice of travel store to buy luggage in Singapore! As a globally recognised and trusted brand, they have quality luggage at great prices that will make your travels feel even more exciting! Not a fan of hard casing? No worries, they’ve got softside luggage as well! This travel store has all the options you could ask for… and more! Hence, at American Tourister, you’ll find durable, stylish, and most importantly, affordable luggage for all your travel needs.

          3. The Planet Traveller

          Facebook: Visit Here

          Instagram: Visit Here

          Website: https://www.theplanettraveller.com/

          Address: Locations

          Operating Hours: Locations

          The Planet Traveller is your one-stop destination to browse all the essentials you’ll need to, ahem, travel the planet. Shop over 80 international brands like Briggs & Riley, Echolac, Sandqvist and Bric’s. You can even find travel necessities from Bellroy, Fuman Gear, Lewis n Clark, Sea to Summit and more! Make sure to stay safe when travelling with quality safety accessories, organise your belongings in travel pouches, and keep on track with bags, watches, and belts. Plus, you can score some good deals up to 70% off in their past season clearance sales!

          4. The Travel Store

          Facebook: Visit Here

          Instagram: Visit Here

          Website: https://www.thetravelstore.com.sg/

          Address: Locations

          Operating Hours: Daily, 11am-9:30pm

          The Travel Store has been providing travellers with their essentials since 1998. With a collection curated from premium labels, they’ve unquestionably become one of the best places to buy luggage in Singapore. Browse brands like Slazenger, Deuter, Vaude, Eminent, Lojel, Hush Puppies and more. You’ll find secure luggage with tamper-proof double zippers, TSA combination locks and lightweight, expansionable and durable suitcases ready for travelling the world. There’s no doubt you’ll find all your travel essentials here at The Travel Store!

          5. Tumi

          Facebook: Visit Here

          Instagram: Visit Here

          Website: https://www.tumi.sg/

          Address: Multiple Locations 

          Soft, sleek and stylish. That’s what Tumi is all about! With ultra-functional, durable luggage that have been through over 30 unique tests, Tumi’s guaranteed to be one of the best of the best. It’s all about investing in a good piece of luggage. And you know that they have the quality to back up their claims; their luggage is made from heavy-duty materials like Ballistic Nylon and Tegris®. They even have a TUMI Tracer® feature which helps you reunite with your lost and stolen luggage bags if needed!

          6. Rimowa

          Facebook: Visit Here

          Instagram: Visit Here

          Website: https://www.rimowa.com/sg/en/home

          Address: Locations

          After over 120 years of experience, Rimowa is definitely one of the best luggage brands in Singapore if you’re looking for a little luxury. With a perfected multiwheel system that rotates 360° and enhanced TSA locks for security, Rimowa’s luggage is perfect for all your travel needs. They’re also lightweight and built to last, even in extreme climates! Plus, with a beautiful selection of colours and neutral shades, you can showcase your personality! What’s more, at Rimowa, you can also find luggage tags and bags, suitcase covers, travel organisers, and all sorts of bags for all your travel necessities. Let’s travel in style with Rimowa!

          7. Luggage Outlet

          Facebook: Visit Here

          Instagram: Visit Here

          Website: https://www.luggageoutlet.sg/

          Address: Online

          There’s no better place to get quality luggage without a hefty price tag than Luggage Outlet in Singapore! From softside cases to premium aluminium hard case luggage, from 2-wheelers to 8-wheelers, Luggage Outlet has a large variety of reliable luggage in their catalogue. Be extra prepared with suitcase covers and all types of travel bags—like crossbody bags and travel pouches—for convenient storage. You’re sure to find something that appeals to you here!

          P.S. Get free delivery within 2-3 weekdays for orders in Singapore!

          8. Ace

          Facebook: Visit Here

          Instagram: Visit Here

          Website: https://www.ace-dot.com/english/

          Address: Online

          In their mission to help people travel with the comfortable “seiteki” design composed of “ideal shapes, ideal designs”, Ace offers a selection of sleek luggage that will appeal to the modern eye. This Japanese luggage brand has influences from its home country in terms of aesthetics, feelings and spirit. Hence, displaying fashionable and practical luggage that will capture the beauty of travelling.

          They have two sub-sections: Tokyo Label for casual trolley bags, backpacks and shoulder backs, and Gene Label for business use. What’s more, all of their luggage has dual-wheel casters for quieter and easier turning, and TSA dial locks! There’s no doubt that this is one ace brand for luggage in Singapore!

          9. July

          Facebook: Visit Here

          Instagram: Visit Here

          Website: https://july.com/au/

          Address: Online 

          Elevate your travel experience with July’s sustainable, long-lasting luggage. After all, luggage is an investment, not something you want to keep replacing. July has three sizes: Carry On, Checked and Checked Plus. Some of the Carry On collection even have ejectable batteries with FastCharge USB-C (airline safe, of course) so you won’t have to worry about your devices running out of charge!

          As it is, their luggage is reinforced with their innovative eggshell shaped curvature and custom bumpers, which means more bounce when your luggage is knocked around. The bends and corners, the known weakest points, are now protected. And that’s not all! You can personalise your luggage for an even more unique suitcase! So get ready to explore the world in style with July!

          Conclusion

          And that’s that! Our recommendations for the best travel stores to buy luggage in Singapore. Are you ready to jet off now? We hope so!

          Now that you’re ready to go with your luggage and other travel essentials, where are you going to travel? Check out these 12 Best VTL Countries to Vacation Away From Singapore for an amazing globetrotting experience!
